name: Being (The_Niche_Corner)
description:
For Adventure Creator 72 hour Game Jam, April 2017.

(Created in only 24 hours)

Join the seemingly intelligent yet lovably naive aliens Mulligan & O'Hare, and their leader Sir Serr of Cirrington, as they embark on a rather silly (and ultimately pointless) quest to show humans they are visiting peacefully. They'll unintentionally get drunk, blow stuff up, and nearly trigger an invasion, all in the space of a few minutes!
